review: I think this has the potential to be AWESOME but mine, right now, is anything but. I love the design and the packaging. I plugegd everything in and attempted to begin setup. Immediately, I was told that it was not connected to the power supply even though it was. I unplugged and replugged several times until I finally took off the extender and plugged directly into the tv. When it came time to connect to my network, I had to walk through these steps 5 times before it finally established a connection. The entire setup process took over 45 minutes before I could even get to the point of the welcome video.I began signing into my accounts on the Netflix and Hulu Plus apps and it seemed to be working ok for the first 5 minutes but then the remote started flipping out. Sometimes it would lag a few seconds before responding; other times just one click would send the cursor darting wildly in every direction for several seconds before finally stopping clear across the screen. I removed and reinserted the batteries hoping to reset their connection, but no luck.The following night, and the two nights since, I cannot even get the FireTV stick to connect or maintain a connection with my network. If I use the extender, I'm warned that it is not connected to the power supply (even though it is). I don't know if I just happened to receive a faulty device or if this is what to expect will any of this first iteration. I will be sending it back and asking for a replacement. I'm really hoping that resolves my issues because I think, if working properly, this will be a fantastic device.
